synopsis.text:
Smart City Kashiwanoha, nestled in the heart of Kashiwa City, Chiba Prefecture, witnesses an extraordinary turn of events in the year 2018. A family, eager to start a new chapter, embarks on a tour of the model room in the prestigious Park City Kashiwanoha Campus The Gate Tower. Little do they know, their search for a new home will lead them to a world beyond their wildest dreams.

As they explore the bustling town, they are left awe-struck when they discover that some of the surrounding condominiums possess an incredible secret - the ability to transform into colossal robots. The family's astonishment reaches its peak when the very tower apartment they visited earlier metamorphoses into a titanic mechanical being, causing the ground to tremble beneath their feet.

In the face of such an unexpected revelation, the family is left speechless, questioning the true nature of this futuristic city. What lies beneath the surface of this seemingly idyllic urban landscape, and what other secrets does this town harbor? Join the family as they unravel the enigma that is Kashiwanoha Smart City.
